speakers.name: Mirvais Niaz
speakers.bio:
Dedicated, decisive, and compassionate police Officer with over nine years of progressive experience in police force of Pakistan.   
Specialties: Prevention and detection of suicide bombings.  
Securing premises against potential threats especially IEDs.   
Intelligence gathering and its in timely dispersal.  
Crime scene search and modern forensic techniques.   
Crisis response management.   
Installation and use of modern preventive gadgetry.      
Bomb disposal and security clearance of buildings.      
VVIP Escort with preventive measures of entourage and built up area.
